titleStmt.title: Spiritual salt: or, A sermon on Matth. 5.13. Ye are the salt of the earth- preached in Whitchurch at an ordination of five ministers, Febr.20.1649. By Tho. Porter, M.A. minister of the Gospel there.
titleStmt.author: Porter, Thomas, d. 1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. & E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the signe of the blew Bible in Cornhill neer the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the blew Bible in Cornhill neer the Royal Exchange
